availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Frederick B. Merrimee LOSER (Marion County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Hamilton Merrimee in Lebanon, Kentucky, on October 16, 1853. Father of Thomas H. Merrimee, Marie E. Merrimee, and Leonard S. Merrimee. Merchant in Marion County in 1850. Merchant in Marion County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District 1, p. 342B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Lebanon District 1, p. 552.

U.S. Civil War Pension Index: General Index to Pension Files, 1861-1934, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series T288, Application #529512.
